snippet.title: Happy's Humble Burger Barn - Official Gameplay Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2021
snippet.description:
Take a look at gameplay, including making cookies, burgers, and managing a restaurant in this latest trailer for Happy's Humble Burger Barn, as showcased during Guerrilla Collective 2021 on Day 2. However, prepare yourself because it gets a little creepy. Happy's Humble Burger Barn, the game where restaurant simulation meets survival horror, is headed to PC.

#GameTrailers #Gaming #SummerOfGaming
